00015 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00016 //  Declares datatype to store a raw image file and calls method to load image
00017 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018 
00019 GLubyte* TexturedPolygons::LoadTexture(char* filename, int imgWidth, int imgHeight)
00020 {
00021         //
00022         unsigned char* image = NULL;
00023         image = LoadRawImageFile(filename, imgWidth, imgHeight);
00024         // inform user if file loaded
00025         cout << "Loading image file " << filename << "...\n";
00026         return image;
00027 }
00028 
00029 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 //  Creates memory space to store raw image file and reads in file from disk.
00031 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 
00033 GLubyte* TexturedPolygons::LoadRawImageFile(char* filename, int width, int height)
00034 {
00035         FILE* file;
00036         unsigned char* image;
00037         // create memory space w x h x 3 (3 stores RGB values)
00038         image = (unsigned char*)malloc(sizeof(unsigned char) * width * height * 3);
00039         file = fopen(filename, "rb" );
00040         // exit program if image not found and inform user
00041         if (file == NULL)
00042         {
00043                 cout << "ERROR loading image file: " << filename << "...\n";
00044                 exit(0);
00045         }
00046         fread(image, width * height * 3, 1, file);
00047         fclose(file);
00048     return image;
00049 }

00051 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 //  Set number of textures to be used in program
00053 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 
00055 void TexturedPolygons::SetTextureCount(const int &textureNo)
00056 {
00057         m_texture = new GLuint[textureNo];
00058         glGenTextures(textureNo, &m_texture[0]);
00059 }
00060 
00061 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 //  Clears memory used to store textures when program terminates (very important)
00063 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 
00065 void TexturedPolygons::Clear()
00066 {
00067         m_texture = NULL;
00068         if (m_texture == NULL)
00069         {
00070                 delete [] m_texture;
00071         }
00072 }
00073 
00074 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 //  Creates texture and set required values for texture mapping
00076 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 
00078 void TexturedPolygons::CreateTexture(int textureNo, unsigned char* image, int imgWidth, int imgHeight)
00079 {
00080         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, m_texture[textureNo]);
00081         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00082         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
00083         gluBuild2DMipmaps(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 3, imgWidth, imgHeight, GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, image);
00084 }
00085 
00086 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 //  Calls functions to create display lists, depending on parameters.
00088 //  I created these functions very early on in the program before I had a full understanding,
00089 //  therefore I would probably create a better function for the purpose, but this works well.
00090 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00091 
00092 void TexturedPolygons::CreateDisplayList(const int &XYZ, const int &listNo, 
00093                                                  const GLdouble &xImgSize, const GLdouble &zImgSize, 
00094                                                              const GLdouble &xStart, const GLdouble &yStart, const GLdouble &zStart,
00095                                                              const GLdouble &xTimes, const GLdouble &zTimes)
00096 {
00097         glNewList(listNo, GL_COMPILE);
00098                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00099                 switch (XYZ)
00100                 {
00101                         case 0:
00102                                 // create list where image is on X and Y axis
00103                                 CreateXtoYTextureList(xImgSize, zImgSize, xStart, yStart, zStart, xTimes, zTimes, false);
00104                                 break;
00105                         case 1:
00106                                 // create list where image is on X and Z axis
00107                                 CreateXtoZTextureList(xImgSize, zImgSize, xStart, yStart, zStart, xTimes, zTimes);
00108                                 break;
00109                         case 2:
00110                                 // create list where image is on Y and Z axis
00111                                 CreateYtoZTextureList(xImgSize, zImgSize, xStart, yStart, zStart, xTimes, zTimes, false);
00112                                 break;
00113                         case 3:
00114                                 // create list where (flipped) image is on X and Z axis
00115                                 CreateYtoZTextureList(xImgSize, zImgSize, xStart, yStart, zStart, xTimes, zTimes, true);
00116                                 break;
00117                         case 4:
00118                                 // create list where (flipped) image is on X and Y axis
00119                                 CreateXtoYTextureList(xImgSize, zImgSize, xStart, yStart, zStart, xTimes, zTimes, true);
00120                                 break;
00121                 }
00122                 glEnd();
00123         glEndList();
00124 }
00125 
00126 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 //  Create display list with image plotted on X to Z axis
00128 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00129 
00130 void TexturedPolygons::CreateXtoZTextureList(const GLdouble &xImgSize, const GLdouble &zImgSize, 
00131                                                                  const GLdouble &xStart, const GLdouble &yStart, const GLdouble &zStart,
00132                                                                  const GLdouble &xTimes, const GLdouble &zTimes)
00133 {
00134         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
00135         glVertex3f(xStart, yStart , zStart);
00136         glTexCoord2f(0.0, zTimes);
00137         glVertex3f(xStart, yStart,zStart + (zImgSize * zTimes));
00138         glTexCoord2f(xTimes, zTimes);
00139         glVertex3f(xStart + (xImgSize * xTimes), yStart,zStart + (zImgSize * zTimes));
00140         glTexCoord2f(xTimes, 0.0);
00141         glVertex3f(xStart + (xImgSize * xTimes), yStart, zStart);
00142 }
00143 
00144 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00145 //  Create display list with image plotted on X to Y axis
00146 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00147 
00148 void TexturedPolygons::CreateXtoYTextureList(const GLdouble &xImgSize, const GLdouble &yImgSize, 
00149                                                                          const GLdouble &xStart, const GLdouble &yStart, const GLdouble &zStart,
00150                                                                          const GLdouble &xTimes, const GLdouble &yTimes, const bool &flip)
00151 {
00152         GLdouble flipX = 0.0;
00153         GLdouble tempX = xTimes;
00154         // if image is required to be flipped (this will be improved)
00155         if (flip)
00156         {
00157                 flipX = xTimes;
00158                 tempX = 0.0;
00159         }
00160         glTexCoord2f(flipX, 0.0);
00161         glVertex3f(xStart, yStart, zStart);
00162         glTexCoord2f(flipX, yTimes);   
00163         glVertex3f(xStart, yStart + (yImgSize * yTimes), zStart);
00164         glTexCoord2f(tempX, yTimes);
00165         glVertex3f(xStart + (xImgSize * xTimes), yStart + (yImgSize * yTimes), zStart);
00166         glTexCoord2f(tempX, 0.0);
00167         glVertex3f(xStart + (xImgSize * xTimes), yStart, zStart);
00168 }
00169 
00170 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00171 //  Create display list with image plotted on Y to A axis
00172 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00173 
00174 void TexturedPolygons::CreateYtoZTextureList(const GLdouble &yImgSize, const GLdouble &zImgSize, 
00175                                                                          const GLdouble &xStart, const GLdouble &yStart, const GLdouble &zStart,
00176                                                                          const GLdouble &yTimes, const GLdouble &zTimes, const bool &flip)
00177 {
00178         GLdouble flipZ = 0.0;
00179         GLdouble tempZ = zTimes;
00180         // if image is required to be flipped
00181         if (flip)
00182         {
00183                 flipZ = zTimes;
00184                 tempZ = 0.0;
00185         }
00186         glTexCoord2f(0.0, flipZ);
00187         glVertex3f(xStart, yStart, zStart);
00188         glTexCoord2f(0.0, tempZ);
00189         glVertex3f(xStart, yStart, zStart + (zImgSize * zTimes));
00190         glTexCoord2f(yTimes, tempZ);
00191         glVertex3f(xStart,yStart + (yImgSize * yTimes), zStart + (zImgSize * zTimes));
00192         glTexCoord2f(yTimes, flipZ);
00193         glVertex3f(xStart, yStart + (yImgSize * yTimes), zStart);       
00194 }
00195 
00196 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00197 //  Used to create display lists where the image size is not to scale with the world
00198 //  co-ordinates.
00199 //  This is mainly used to create lists for the larger images (i.e. windows and doors),
00200 //  where they are to large to keep to scale.
00201 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00202 
00203 void TexturedPolygons::CreateYtoZWindowList(const int &listNo, const GLdouble &xStart, 
00204                                                                                         const GLdouble &yStart, const GLdouble &ySize, 
00205                                                                                         const GLdouble &zStart, const GLdouble &zSize,
00206                                                                                         const GLdouble &yImgSize, const GLdouble &zImgSize)
00207 {
00208         glNewList(listNo, GL_COMPILE);
00209                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00210                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, zImgSize);
00211                         glVertex3f(xStart, yStart, zStart);
00212                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
00213                         glVertex3f(xStart, yStart, zStart + zSize);
00214                         glTexCoord2f(yImgSize, 0.0);
00215                         glVertex3f(xStart,yStart + ySize, zStart + zSize);
00216                         glTexCoord2f(yImgSize, zImgSize);
00217                         glVertex3f(xStart, yStart + ySize, zStart);     
00218                 glEnd();
00219         glEndList();
00220 }
00221 
00222 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00223 
00224 void TexturedPolygons::CreateXtoYWindowList(const int &listNo, const GLdouble &zStart, 
00225                                                                                         const GLdouble &xStart, const GLdouble &xSize, 
00226                                                                                         const GLdouble &yStart, const GLdouble &ySize,
00227                                                                                         const GLdouble &xImgSize, const GLdouble &yImgSize)
00228 {
00229         glNewList(listNo, GL_COMPILE);
00230                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00231                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
00232                         glVertex3f(xStart, yStart, zStart);
00233                         glTexCoord2f(xImgSize, 0.0);
00234                         glVertex3f(xStart + xSize, yStart, zStart);
00235                         glTexCoord2f(xImgSize, yImgSize);
00236                         glVertex3f(xStart + xSize, yStart + ySize, zStart);
00237                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, yImgSize);
00238                         glVertex3f(xStart, yStart + ySize, zStart);     
00239                 glEnd();
00240         glEndList();
00241 }
00242 
00243 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00244 //  Used to create display lists where the image is on an angle.
00245 //  The final two parameters are used to rotate the image so that it appears correctly.
00246 //  This works by passing the number of the smallest co-ordinate.
00247 //  Eg, smallestX = 1 to 4 for smallest x values (image angles on the XZ or XY axis)
00248 //      smallestX = 5 to 8 for smallest y values (image angles on the YZ)
00249 //      smallestZ = 1 to 4 for smallest z values (image angles on the XZ or YZ)
00250 //      smallestZ = 5 to 8 for smallest y values (image angles on the XY)
00251 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00252 
00253 void TexturedPolygons::CreateAngledPolygon(const int &listNo, 
00254                                                                                    const GLdouble &imageWidth, const GLdouble &imageHeight,
00255                                                                                    const GLdouble &x1, const GLdouble &x2, 
00256                                                                                    const GLdouble &x3, const GLdouble &x4,
00257                                                                                    const GLdouble &y1, const GLdouble &y2,
00258                                                                                    const GLdouble &y3, const GLdouble &y4,
00259                                                                                    const GLdouble &z1, const GLdouble &z2,
00260                                                                                    const GLdouble &z3, const GLdouble &z4,
00261                                                                                    const int &smallestX, const int &smallestZ)
00262 {
00263         GLdouble xImage1 = x1;
00264         GLdouble xImage2 = x2;
00265         GLdouble xImage3 = x3;
00266         GLdouble xImage4 = x4;
00267         GLdouble zImage1 = z1;
00268         GLdouble zImage2 = z2;
00269         GLdouble zImage3 = z3;
00270         GLdouble zImage4 = z4;
00271 
00272         if (smallestX == 1)
00273         {
00274                 CreateTextureScale(xImage1, xImage2, xImage3, xImage4, imageWidth);
00275         }
00276         else if (smallestX == 2)
00277         {
00278                 CreateTextureScale(xImage2, xImage1, xImage3, xImage4, imageWidth);
00279         }
00280         else if (smallestX == 3)
00281         {
00282                 CreateTextureScale(xImage3, xImage1, xImage2, xImage4, imageWidth);
00283         }
00284         else if (smallestX == 4)
00285         {
00286                 CreateTextureScale(xImage4, xImage1, xImage2, xImage3, imageWidth);
00287         }
00288         else
00289         {
00290                 xImage1 = y1;
00291                 xImage2 = y2;
00292                 xImage3 = y3;
00293                 xImage4 = y4;
00294                 if (smallestX == 5)
00295                 {
00296                         CreateTextureScale(xImage1, xImage2, xImage3, xImage4, imageWidth);
00297                 }
00298                 else if (smallestX == 6)
00299                 {
00300                         CreateTextureScale(xImage2, xImage1, xImage3, xImage4, imageWidth);
00301                 }
00302                 else if (smallestX == 7)
00303                 {
00304                         CreateTextureScale(xImage3, xImage1, xImage2, xImage4, imageWidth);
00305                 }
00306                 else if (smallestX == 8)
00307                 {
00308                         CreateTextureScale(xImage4, xImage1, xImage2, xImage3, imageWidth);
00309                 }
00310         }       
00311         if (smallestZ == 1)
00312         {
00313                 CreateTextureScale(zImage1, zImage2, zImage3, zImage4, imageHeight);
00314         }
00315         else if (smallestZ == 2)
00316         {
00317                 CreateTextureScale(zImage2, zImage1, zImage3, zImage4, imageHeight);
00318         }
00319         else if (smallestZ == 3)
00320         {
00321                 CreateTextureScale(zImage3, zImage1, zImage2, zImage4, imageHeight);
00322         }
00323         else if (smallestZ == 4)
00324         {
00325                 CreateTextureScale(zImage4, zImage1, zImage2, zImage3, imageHeight);
00326         }
00327         else
00328         {
00329                 zImage1 = y1;
00330                 zImage2 = y2;
00331                 zImage3 = y3;
00332                 zImage4 = y4;
00333                 if (smallestZ == 5)
00334                 {
00335                         CreateTextureScale(zImage1, zImage2, zImage3, zImage4, imageHeight);
00336                 }
00337                 else if (smallestZ == 6)
00338                 {
00339                         CreateTextureScale(zImage2, zImage1, zImage3, zImage4, imageHeight);
00340                 }
00341                 else if (smallestZ == 7)
00342                 {
00343                         CreateTextureScale(zImage3, zImage1, zImage2, zImage4, imageHeight);
00344                 }
00345                 else if (smallestZ == 8)
00346                 {
00347                         CreateTextureScale(zImage4, zImage1, zImage2, zImage3, imageHeight);
00348                 }
00349         }
00350         // create display list
00351         glNewList(listNo, GL_COMPILE);
00352                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00353                         glTexCoord2f(xImage1, zImage1);
00354                         glVertex3f(x1, y1, z1);
00355                         glTexCoord2f(xImage2, zImage2);
00356                         glVertex3f(x2, y2, z2);
00357                         glTexCoord2f(xImage3, zImage3);
00358                         glVertex3f(x3, y3, z3);
00359                         glTexCoord2f(xImage4, zImage4);
00360                         glVertex3f(x4, y4, z4);
00361                 glEnd();
00362         glEndList();
00363 
00364 }
00365 
00366 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00367 //  Called from CreateAngledPolygon determine how images are displayed
00368 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00369 
00370 void TexturedPolygons::CreateTextureScale(GLdouble & xzImage1, GLdouble & xzImage2, 
00371                                                                                   GLdouble & xzImage3, GLdouble & xzImage4,
00372                                                                                   const GLdouble &imageSize)
00373 {
00374         xzImage2 = ((xzImage2 - xzImage1) / imageSize);
00375         xzImage3 = ((xzImage3 - xzImage1) / imageSize);
00376         xzImage4 = ((xzImage4 - xzImage1) / imageSize);
00377         xzImage1 = 0.0;
00378 }
